Module org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi
Package org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi

Class RemoteFileDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi.RemoteFileDescriptorBase<java.lang.Void>
      • org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi.RemoteFileDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public final class RemoteFileDescriptor
extends RemoteFileDescriptorBase<java.lang.Void>
    A generic (unspecific) FileDescriptor reference.
    Author:
    Christian Kohlschütter
    See Also:
    RemoteFileInput, RemoteFileOutput, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.newsclub.net.unix.rmi.RemoteFileDescriptorBase

        BIT_READABLE, BIT_WRITABLE, MAGIC_VALUE_MASK, resource

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RemoteFileDescriptor()
      Creates an uninitialized instance; used for externalization.
      RemoteFileDescriptor​(AFUNIXRMISocketFactory socketFactory, java.io.FileDescriptor fd)
      Creates a new RemoteFileOutput instance, encapsulating a generic FileDescriptor so that it can be shared with other processes via RMI.

      • RemoteFileDescriptor

        public RemoteFileDescriptor​(AFUNIXRMISocketFactory socketFactory,
                            java.io.FileDescriptor fd)
        Creates a new RemoteFileOutput instance, encapsulating a generic FileDescriptor so that it can be shared with other processes via RMI.
        Parameters:
        socketFactory - The socket factory.
        fd - The FileDescriptor.
